ygData.subject: Re: Test server info.. - Bard Meditate
ygData.msgSnippet: Doubt this applies to bards but my necro is now getting a message when fear wears off...nice..hehh Cethan ... From: Kassao  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Doubt this applies to bards but my necro is now getting a message when fear
wears off...nice..hehh

Cethan
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kassao" <kassao@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 08, 2000 8:28 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Test server info.. - Bard Meditate


> From: "Kassao" <kassao@...>
>
> (tried sending once but not sure it went.. sorry if it is mailed twice)
>
> Not sure if this has been posted, hope not..
> On the test server bards now have meditate, to memorize spells faster.
This is from a person I group with, so can't give you first hand knowledge.
Also, I haven't played my bard in quite awhile so can't remember how lullaby
reported back to the player, but the bard I was with say they are getting
messages when lullaby is resisted... again it seems to me that that is not
a new thing, but posting it just in case.
>
> Kassao, 31st bard, Tarew Marr
> Mizst, 41st Necro, Tarew Marr
> Tasao, 19th Cleric, Test
> Shae, 9th Enchanter, Test
>
> p.s. about 80 days played, if not more.. and not a 50 to my credit... Do
I like to goof off? =p
>
>
>
